banner.text: As part of a detailed onboarding process, we work with our customers to identify the best individual integration option and take into account the customer-specific requirements for the connection. Contact us for more information and a non-binding initial discussion.

content.content: With the simple integration into existing system landscapes, the use of existing workflows is as easy as can be. This means that any company can realize the benefits of Conversionmaker.ai efficiently and cost-effectively .

For technology partners and large customers, our API and modern SDKs also provide an easy way to  Conversionmaker.ai into their systems and applications (e.g. PIM, CMS, store systems or similar). This offers opportunities to profit from our modern AI technology in commercial use in a scalable way.

faq.content: The Copy Score is calculated using a weighted set of rules applied to your texts. The set of rules results from years of experience in conversion rate optimization and the results of thousands of A/B tests.
faq.question: How is the Copy Score calculated?

faq.content: You can achieve a copy score of 100 by improving your text with the help of our text optimization suggestions. In addition, your text should be free of grammatical and spelling errors, tailored to your target audience, and easy to read.
faq.question: How do I achieve a Copy Score of 100?

faq.content:
Conversionmaker.ai supports the following languages:
  • Bulgarian
  • Chinese
  • Danish
  • German (+ Austria & Switzerland)
  • English (GB + US)
  • Estonian
  • Finnish
  • French
  • Greek
  • Indonian
  • Italian
  • Japanese
  • Korean
  • Latvian
  • Lithuanian
  • Dutch
  • Norwegian
  • Polish
  • Portuguese (+BR)
  • Romanian
  • Russian
  • Swedish
  • Slovak
  • Slovenian
  • Spanish
  • Czech
  • Turkish
  • Ukrainian
  • Hungarian
faq.question: Which languages are supported?

faq.content: We determine the tone of your text together during onboarding. We analyze your  and your target audience and then choose the tonality for you based on the results of thousands of tests. In addition, you will always receive up to three text proposals in different tonalities from which you can choose.
faq.question: Can I specify the tonality in the texts?

faq.content: Currently we offer a direct connection to Shopware, Shopify, Magento 2, Google Analytics. Conversionmaker.ai can also be connected to any PIM system, ERP system or CMS via REST API.
faq.question: What integrations with store or PIM systems do you offer?

faq.content: Yes, Conversionmaker.ai can be connected to any marketing tool via our API. All you have to do is create a project in our software and you can integrate Conversionmaker.ai into your marketing tool.
faq.question: Can I couple Conversionmaker.ai with existing marketing tools?

faq.content: You can invite your colleagues to your existing project directly via the user management in Conversionmaker.ai. They will then receive an invitation code from us via email and can accept your invitation.
faq.question: How can others join my project?

faq.content: The free trial is a light version of our professional plan. You can test all features only in the paid version for 7 days.
faq.question: What is included in my free trial?

faq.content: After the end of your trial period, you can switch to the plan that suits you best at any time. Your trial period expires after the trial period without any costs for you. You do not have to cancel the trial period.
faq.question: What happens after the end of my trial period?

faq.content: The rates differ in the features, the support available to you and the number of AI words you can run per month. You can find more information about this on our plan overview.
faq.question: How do the plans differ?

faq.content: The contract period of the Professional and Enterprise plan is at least 12 months. The amount is invoiced on an annual basis. You can also pay and top up KI-Credits via PayPal at any time.
faq.question: What payment methods are supported?

faq.content: The costs for the Enterprise plan are based on the number of your unique users. We will be happy to create an individual offer for you
faq.question: What does the Enterprise plan cost?

faq.content: You can cancel your plan at any time within the cancellation period by sending an email to mwitzenleiter@conversionmaker.com with your cancellation. In case of an annual contract period, the cancellation must be declared at least 90 days before the end of the contract period.
faq.question: How can I cancel?

faq.content: The texts are generated independently for each request. With a probability of more than 99%, the text you generate is unique and you have the full right to use your generated texts.
faq.question: Are copyright infringements ruled out?

faq.content: Yes, when using Conversionmaker.ai, your data will not be used or stored as training data with OpenAI (unlike when using ChatGPT regularly)
faq.question: Is the usage privacy compliant?

appDemo.videoHeader: We'll show you how it works!

text.label: Advantages, features & usage scenarios
text.value:
Anti-stick grill grate prevents food from sticking.
Infinitely variable burners for perfect grilling results.
Removable grease drip tray for easy cleaning.
Unforgettable barbecues with friends and family.

carousel.content:
The barbecue season has arrived and you are looking for a high quality yet inexpensive gas barbecue? Then we recommend the the M-1000 gas barbecue from BBQ-PRO. This grill series is especially suitable for the demanding and exact grill gourmet.

The non-stick grill surface also prevents food from sticking when camping and is designed for a particularly long service life thanks to a special coating. The adjustable and easy-to-use burners ensure perfect grilling results. A high efficiency of the burners guarantees the short warm-up time and a long burn time.

The camping gas barbecue M-1000 from BBQ-PRO is a compact barbecue for camping and garden area. It is made of sturdy cast aluminum and has a cast grill grate that prevents food from sticking. The removable grease drip tray makes cleaning particularly easy.

The enclosed instructions show you step by step how to optimally set up and use the gas barbecue.

Are you looking for a compact, robust and lightweight gas barbecue that you can also use when camping? Then the BBQ-PRO gas grill M-1000 is the golden choice for you! The special feature of this gas barbecue is the easy cleaning: The porcelain-melted cast grill grate prevents sticking of grilled food.

The infinitely variable burner valve allows you to adjust the temperature for the grilling process optimally. The ease of use of the M-1000 will give you unforgettable grilling experiences.

output.heading: ü§ñYour AI text proposals (freely combinable!)

automatedTextGeneration.description: The customized integration of our solution into your systems ensures true automation of your text processes. This allows you to reduce your costs and increase efficiency. Thanks to our unique API connection, you have the ability to create thousands of marketing texts completely automatically in a very short time. Learn more here.
automatedTextGeneration.title: Automated text creation

generateTexts.description:
The AI we have trained automatically creates unique and professional marketing texts that sell, using just a few keywords.

What's special about it? Our AI analyzes your existing texts and provides you with individual text suggestions for a wide variety of use cases.
generateTexts.title: Create converting texts in seconds

optimizeTexts.description: You too can benefit from our many years of expertise in the field of CRO. Optimize your existing marketing texts with the help of our professional tips, which were developed based on the results of countless A/B tests in the wording and content area.
optimizeTexts.title: Optimize your texts with our professional tips

shopIntegration.description:
Through the connection to Shopify, Shopware or Google Analytics, you have all key figures at a glance. Easily identify the greatest uplift potential of your existing texts.

If you link your website or your stores, our AI adapts to your writing style and provides you with even better text suggestions.
shopIntegration.title: Full integration of your store

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.paragraph: We could not answer your question?

content.content: For the industry-leading systems, we have already developed an existing integration that can be used directly and easily. In addition, we are constantly expanding our integration capabilities:
content.heading: Existing connections to store systems, PIM and ERP

content.content: All functions and customer-specific settings can be configured and connected via an API. Modern SDKs in various programming environments are also available for this purpose. The API documentation can be found here
content.heading: Individual integration via API and modern SDK

content.content: A simple solution for integration without major effort is the exchange of data via defined input/output files. The individual, already existing customer data in the data format such as CSV or XML is taken into account for the text input. The output file with the AI generated texts can then be easily processed further. The files are provided as download in the tool or as storage on SFTP servers.
content.heading: Easy exchange via input/output files

reviews.content: Conversionmaker.ai helps numerous companies create high-quality content faster. You too can use our AI-powered software to write content that sells in seconds.
reviews.heading: More than 1,000 active users already trust us

reviews.author: Axel Dietrich
reviews.cite: We regularly need textual online content, especially product texts. Thanks to Conversionmaker.ai, we can now have these created automatically and thus save time and money. Conveniently, the texts are also SEO- and conversion-optimized at the same time, i.e. the usual post-processing is no longer necessary. And speaking of time savings: We also have our social media and blog posts written by the AI - a real benefit for us!
reviews.heading: Conversion-optimized texts at the push of a button
reviews.position: Head of FNX LAB at Fressnapf Tiernahrungs GmbH

reviews.author: Fabian
reviews.cite: The generation of texts and content in general is becoming more and more challenging. Conversion Maker helps by generating or optimizing product and other texts. For this, the AI only needs a few keywords. The tool usually gives 3 different suggestions after generation, which can then be further optimized.
reviews.heading: AI generated texts of various types
reviews.position: Digital Sports Leader at Decathlon Germany

reviews.author: Stephan
reviews.cite: The tool comes with many different features. Originally, we had targeted a smaller application area - but with the functional tool in hand, the temptation to test the other points was naturally great. All the better that the AI could convince here as well.
reviews.heading: Practical software suite with tailored support

reviews.author: Oliver
reviews.cite: The content agency has a good onboarding process where the objective and relevant keywords are defined. In the full-service variant, editors generate professional texts by using an AI and complement them with infographics and photos. Top service at a fair price
reviews.heading: Top content agency with smart AI

reviews.title: What our customers say
